name: Linen Loose Cover for Beale Armchair – Pewter
description: This stylish Loose Linen Slipcover is designed to fit our Beale Armchair's elegant, low-sitting frame. The Beale has an intrinsic ability to pull off every cut, shade and fabric imaginable, which makes it the perfect piece to dress with our loose linen covers. Our Pewter Stonewashed Linen brings a modern touch to the material, which, as the name suggests, is tumbled with stones for a textured finish. You can order up to five free samples of our fabrics. 100% linen loose cover Additional colours available Dry clean only Designed to fit our Beale Armchair
